articles.title: Dreamachine review – as close to state-funded psychedelic drugs as you can get - The Guardian

articles.content: The entire population of Britain is to be given LSD in a government-sponsored attempt to cheer us up after the pandemic and make us forget about inflation. Well, almost. Dreamachine, one of 10 nation… [+4656 chars]
